resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
kou opened a new pull request, #14409:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14409

   Because set-output is deprecated.
   
   See also:
   https://github.blog/changelog/2022-10-11-github-actions-deprecating-save-state-and-set-output-commands/

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14409:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14409#issuecomment-1278350464

   https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18033

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14409:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14409#issuecomment-1278350492

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.
